question: The battle of Rakshasbhuvan was fought in which year?
explanation: The battle of Rakshasbhuvan was fought between the Peshwas (Under the leadership of Madhavrao I) and Nizam in the year 1763 (10th August) near Aurangabad. The army of Nizam faced a huge loss and soon retreated. The main objective of the battle was to recover the losses of the third battle of Panipat.
